verses.name: Genesis 40:11
verses.text: And Pharaoh’s cup was in my hand: and I took the grapes, and pressed them into Pharaoh’s cup, and I gave the cup into Pharaoh’s hand.

verses.name: Genesis 40:12
verses.text: And Joseph said unto him, This is the interpretation of it: The three branches are three days:

verses.name: Genesis 40:13
verses.text: Yet within three days shall Pharaoh lift up thine head, and restore thee unto thy place: and thou shalt deliver Pharaoh’s cup into his hand, after the former manner when thou wast his butler.
